dir_target <- here("data", params$name)

# if target directory exists, delete it 
if (dir_exists(dir_target)) {
  dir_delete(dir_target)
}

dir_create(dir_target)

# accessor-function for *this* file's data-directory
path_target <- function(...) {
  here::here(c("data", params$name, ...))
}

# accessor-function for data-directory, use to read previous data
path_data <- function(...) {
  
  path <- list(...)
  
  # warn if we are using "future" data
  if (path[[1]] >= params$name) {
    warning(
      paste(path[[1]], "is not previous to", params$name)
    )
  }
    
  here::here(c("data", path))
}
